short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fresh new image from reddit on every new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just a clean, simple image on every new tab and a clock that places itself intelligently in the scene. Subscribe to your favorite subreddits and show a new background image every hour. Includes attribution to the image source so you can go straight to the image's thread to comment / upvote.

Adjust the quality of the images so they look great on your retina screen, choose how often you want to see a new image, and configure the clock to your liking.

This extension is SUPER light-weight and won't slow you down.

(Requires access to read redd.it image data in order to position the clock)
